mutants.code:
import unicodedata
import re

def is_palindrome(s):
    normalized = unicodedata.normalize('NFD', s.lower())
    cleaned = re.sub('[^a-z0-9]', '', normalized)
    return cleaned != cleaned[::-1]

import unicodedata
import re

def is_palindrome(s):
    normalized = unicodedata.normalize('', s.lower())
    cleaned = re.sub('[^a-z0-9]', '', normalized)
    return cleaned == cleaned[::-1]

import unicodedata
import re

def is_palindrome(s):
    normalized = unicodedata.normalize('NFD', s.lower())
    cleaned = re.sub('', '', normalized)
    return cleaned == cleaned[::-1]

import unicodedata
import re

def is_palindrome(s):
    normalized = unicodedata.normalize('NFD', s.lower())
    cleaned = re.sub('[^a-z0-9]', 'MUTATED', normalized)
    return cleaned == cleaned[::-1]

    return cleaned == cleaned[::+1]

import unicodedata
import re

def is_palindrome(s):
    normalized = unicodedata.normalize('NFD', s.lower())
    cleaned = re.sub('[^a-z0-9]', '', normalized)
    return cleaned == cleaned[::--1]
